project.name: acetate-entity
project.description:
"Entity" metamodel leverages and extends the acetate domain model, providing an easy to understand yet versitile data-driven domain model.
The entity metamodel is influenced by Domain Drive Design (DDD), Event Driven Architecture, Event Sourcing, Command Query Responsibliity Segregation (CQRS), and the Representational State Transfer (REST) methodologies. Based on these concepts, the entity framework defines (and verifies) a few rules in desigining an entity data model, making it possible to easily leverage the entity metamodel to provide additional capablilities (for example, such as generated RESTful services and/or data binding capabilities)
